name: Demon
text: Attacks from Demons have a chance to burn all of the enemy's mana and deal that much true damage.

ranks.text: Dragons become immune to magic damage.
If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain a shield equal to 100% of their maximum health.

name: Glacial
text: Attacks from Glacials have a chance to stun for 2s.

ranks.text: Robots start combat at full mana.

name: Noble
text: +100 Armor and heal 35 health per attack.

name: Ninja
text: The Ninja trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 Ninjas.

ranks.text: Earn up to 4 additional gold after combat against another player
Curse a random enemy at the start of combat, settings their HP to 100

name: Wild
text: Attacks generate stacks of Fury (stacks up to 5 times). Each stack of Fury gives 8% Attack Speed.

ranks.text: All basic attacks ignore 50% of the enemy's armor

name: Yordle
text: Attacks against ally Yordles have a chance to miss.
